#summary Plugin development overivew

= Introduction =

Writing plugins for easyb is simple and primarily involves implementing the EasybPlugin method and declaring your plugin using the service provider pattern defined in the Jar specification.


= Details =

To create a plugin for easyb:
  * Create a class which implements the org.disco.easyb.plugin.EasybPlugin interface
  * Create a file name org.disco.easyb.plugin.EasybPlugin and ensure that it is packaged in the META-INF/services directory of the jar created by your build process
  * This file should contain a single line which is the fully qualified name of your plugin implementation class.
